author: Reuters Editorial
title: Syria says will holds West responsible for any obstruction to OPCW mission
text:
AMMAN (Reuters) - Syria said on Thursday it would hold the West responsible for any delay in the arrival of a mission from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) to investigate a suspected chemical attack.
A source in the foreign ministry was Quote: d as saying in a news flash on state television that Western parties were seeking to obstruct the mission’s task and “meddle in its work”.
Reporting by Suleiman Al-Khalidi; Editing by Andrew Heavens
